statements: SELECT * FROM email_scheduling ORDER BY email_time ASC;
SELECT email_address FROM email_scheduling WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM email_scheduling WHERE time_zone = 'EST';
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM email_scheduling WHERE email_time > '2022-01-01' AND email_time < '2022-02-01';
SELECT customer_id, email_time FROM email_scheduling ORDER BY email_time DESC;
SELECT email_address, email_time FROM email_scheduling WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM email_scheduling WHERE email_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY email_time DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email_address, time_zone FROM email_scheduling WHERE time_zone IN ('PST', 'EST');
SELECT DISTINCT time_zone FROM email_scheduling;
SELECT customer_id, email_address, email_time FROM email_scheduling WHERE time_zone = 'CST' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, email_preference FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY email_preference DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email_preference, time_zone FROM customer_preferences WHERE time_zone='UTC';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(email_id) AS total_emails FROM email_scheduling GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, scheduled_time FROM email_scheduling WHERE scheduled_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, email_preference FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY email_preference DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email_preference, time_zone FROM customer_preferences WHERE time_zone = 'GMT';
SELECT email_id, scheduled_time FROM email_scheduling WHERE scheduled_time > '2022-01-01' AND scheduled_time < '2022-12-31';
SELECT c.customer_id, c.email_preference, s.email_id, s.scheduled_time FROM customer_preferences c INNER JOIN email_scheduling s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id ORDER BY s.scheduled_time;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT email_frequency, email_type FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT * FROM scheduled_emails ORDER BY scheduled_time DESC;
SELECT customer_id, timezone FROM customer_timezones WHERE timezone = 'UTC';
SELECT email_id, email_subject FROM scheduled_emails WHERE scheduled_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM scheduled_emails ORDER BY scheduled_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, email_frequency FROM customer_preferences WHERE email_frequency = 'daily';
SELECT ce.email_subject, ct.timezone FROM scheduled_emails ce JOIN customer_timezones ct ON ce.customer_id = ct.customer_id WHERE ce.scheduled_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ce.email_id, ce.email_subject, cp.email_type FROM scheduled_emails ce JOIN customer_preferences cp ON ce.customer_id = cp.customer_id ORDER BY ce.email_id ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT ce.email_subject, ct.timezone, cp.email_frequency FROM scheduled_emails ce JOIN customer_timezones ct ON ce.customer_id = ct.customer_id JOIN customer_preferences cp ON ce.customer_id = cp.customer_id WHERE cp.email_frequency = 'weekly';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT email, timezone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT preference_type, frequency FROM email_preferences WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM email_schedule WHERE email_type = 'newsletter' ORDER BY send_date DESC;
SELECT email_type, send_date FROM email_schedule WHERE customer_id = 4 AND email_type = 'promotion';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100;
SELECT email, timezone FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM email_preferences ORDER BY preference_type DESC, frequency;
SELECT customer_id, preference_type, frequency FROM email_preferences JOIN customers ON email_preferences.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE frequency = 'daily';
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT email_type, sent_time FROM email_logs ORDER BY sent_time DESC;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM email_templates WHERE template_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM time_zones WHERE utc_offset = '+02:00';
SELECT customer_id, template_id, send_time FROM email_schedule WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY send_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT email_type, sent_time FROM email_logs WHERE customer_id = 200 ORDER BY sent_time DESC;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM email_templates WHERE template_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT zone_name FROM time_zones WHERE utc_offset = '+05:30';
SELECT customer_id, template_id, send_time FROM email_schedule WHERE customer_id = 300 AND template_id = 1 ORDER BY send_time ASC;
